sticky.description: Whether to turn on the anchor point automatic ceiling
sticky.description_zh: 是否开启锚点自动吸顶

sticky-offset-top.description: The distance from the top when the anchor point is automatically raised
sticky-offset-top.description_zh: 锚点自动吸顶时与顶部的距离

teleport.description: Specifies the node to which the index bar is mounted
teleport.description_zh: 指定索引栏挂载的节点

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll to the specified anchor point

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when a character in the index bar is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击索引栏的字符时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the currently highlighted index character changes
events.description_zh: 当前高亮的索引字符变化时触发
